description:
Some guys are just extra fun when it comes to watching them cum.
Maybe it's that they shoot a huge load, or they shoot really far, or maybe it's that it looks like a fountain! There's just something interesting about the way the ropes and puddles of man juice fly and land.
Brad is one of those guys who pretty much falls into all of those categories. You could say he is a "cummer."
He's 19, straight, and he likes to hang out with his friends and play sports.
And watch how he shoots the white stuff out!
title: Brad
